symptoms: MIL on with reduced power and rough idle after cold start.

root_cause_hypotheses.hypothesis: Cylinder 1 ignition coil weak under load
root_cause_hypotheses.evidence: Repeat misfire code on cyl 1 and lean trim spike after cold soak.

root_cause_hypotheses.hypothesis: Vacuum leak near intake manifold gasket
root_cause_hypotheses.evidence: Lean bank readings, whistle noise on snap throttle.

root_cause_hypotheses.hypothesis: Low fuel pressure from aging pump
root_cause_hypotheses.evidence: Lean on both banks at WOT, pump original.

most_likely_cause: Failing cylinder 1 coil causing misfire and lean adaptation.

recommended_actions.step: Scope primary and secondary patterns on cylinder 1 coil
recommended_actions.why: Confirms coil saturation and spark duration before parts replacement.

recommended_actions.step: Swap cylinder 1 coil with cylinder 2 and road test
recommended_actions.why: Verifies if misfire follows the component.

recommended_actions.step: Inspect intake manifold gasket for leaks with smoke
recommended_actions.why: Rules out unmetered air contributing to lean codes.

safety_notes: Disconnect battery before coil removal to avoid secondary arc.
Use fume extraction when performing smoke test.
warranty_or_tsb_refs: Toyota TSB-0094-18 (cold start misfire on A25A engines)
disclaimers: Costs are estimates; confirm with a licensed technician.
Further testing may revise the repair plan.

confidence.assessment: Data aligns with ignition failure pattern; coil testing should verify.

customer_readiness_check.short_reason: Plan is actionable with safety guidance and clear tests.
